text.0: No, #Rwanda’s president #Kagame hasn’t appointed a 19-year-old teenager as the country’s new minister of technology. No such position exists & the image of the alleged minister shows a 12 year-old British boy said to have an IQ higher than Stephen Hawking. https://t.co/EDW7z7Eqrw
text.1:
What drives belief in conspiracy theories? And how harmful can they be? Read the briefing “Conspiracy beliefs” by @AfricaCheck, @Chequeado and @FullFact for answers. https://t.co/NVU4RsvP0o  

Download the PDF: https://t.co/Vjqzv09lcg
text.2:
:airplane_selector: #Kenya’s #tourism minister Najib Balala (@tunajibu) is calling for more investment in the vital industry following Covid-19 restrictions. 

But was his valuation of this vital sector accurate? We checked. https://t.co/9elbDCKcNK
